clientreview: Abdul is an amazing UI/UX expert! I hired for a 3-month project to make my Angular app responsive and worked closely together with him throughout this period. He is very proactive, communicates clearly, executes fast and delivers great code. I highly recommend him! I would definitely hire him again.

I highly recommend him for any development project
